summary.span: RFC 2616 中定义标头及其值的集合。

span.span: A collection of headers and their values as defined in RFC 2616.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 将新的标头及其值插入 集合中。

span.span: Inserts a new header and its values into the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(string name, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> values) cil managed
Public Sub Add (name As String, values As IEnumerable(Of String))

param.name: name
param.span: 要添加到集合中的标头。

span.span: The header to add to the collection.

param.name: values
param.span: 要向集合中添加的标头值的列表。

span.span: A list of header values to add to the collection.

summary.span: 添加指定的标头及其值到 集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified header and its values into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `values`将分析并验证标头。The header `values` will be parsed and validated. 如果指定的标头不存在，此 方法会将新的标头插入标头名称/值对的列表。If the specified header does not exist, the method inserts a new header into the list of header name/value pairs. 如果指定的标头已存在，则 `values` 会将添加到与标头关联的值的逗号分隔列表。If the specified header is already present, `values` are added to the comma-separated list of values associated with the header.

exception.span: 名称不能为 NULL 或为空。

span.span: The name cannot be null or empty.

exception.span: 值不能为 NULL 或为空。

span.span: The values cannot be null or empty.
Misused header name.

exception.span: 请确保请求头与 HttpRequestMessage 一起使用、响应头与 HttpResponseMessage 一起使用，而内容头与 HttpContent 对象一起使用。

span.span: Make sure request headers are used with HttpRequestMessage, response headers with HttpResponseMessage, and content headers with HttpContent objects.
The header name format is invalid.
-or-

exception.span: 标头值中的新行字符必须后接一个空格。

span.span: New line characters in header values must be followed by a white-space character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`将分析并验证标头。The header `value` will be parsed and validated. 如果指定的标头不存在，此 方法会将新的标头插入标头名称/值对的列表。If the specified header does not exist, the method inserts a new header into the list of header name/value pairs. 如果指定的标头已存在， `value` 则会将添加到与标头关联的值的逗号分隔列表。If the specified header is already present, `value` is added to the comma-separated list of values associated with the header.

exception.span: 请确保请求头与 HttpRequestMessage 一起使用、响应头与 HttpResponseMessage 一起使用，而内容头与 HttpContent 对象一起使用。

span.span: Make sure request headers are used with HttpRequestMessage, response headers with HttpResponseMessage, and content headers with HttpContent objects.
The header name format is invalid.
-or-

exception.span: 标头值中的新行字符必须后接一个空格。

span.span: New line characters in header values must be followed by a white-space character.
